tool_description:
Pronunciation Assessment and Scoring API Solutions 
Multi-Dimensional Chinese and English Pronunciation Evaluation API
name: SOE
title: SOE

api_list.name: Mandarin Chinese Sentence Assessment
api_list.description:
- send audio up to 40 seconds long
- reference text up to 100 characters.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://soe1.p.rapidapi.com/api/zh-cmn-Hans-CN/sentence"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "soe1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
